DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read all recordings of online meetings.
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all recordings of online meetings, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read all recordings of online meetings.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read all recordings of online meetings, on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all recordings of online meetings.
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all recordings of all online meetings, without a signed-in user.
